attributes.action: Call a general election and remove Theresa May from being the prime minister
attributes.additional_details: The UK is a laughing stock at the minute and this mess needs fixing as a matter of urgency, the people are becoming really fed up with this brexit situation and it was the government that introduced the idea of brexit to the people with no clear plan how to exit the EU, years later where still in a right mess and this is not acceptable to us British citizens and there is no confidence for Mrs May to continue leading the country from the great British public.
attributes.background: We need a leader who can lead the country away from this brexit disaster and Theresa May is not fit to be prime minister, The uncertainty is causing problems for the British people and the economy
